alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued September 11 at 7:19PM MST until September 11 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 815 PM MST. * At 719 PM MST, a dust channel was 10 miles northwest of Chui-Chu, or 13 miles west of Casa Grande, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 187 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 145 and 178. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 168. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Arizona City, Arizola, Toltec, Stanfield and East Chui-Chu. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
